headline: Travelex Is Crippled By Hackers Seeking A $6 Million Ransom
abstract: Travelex’s stores, airport counters and exchange services were forced offline by a ransomware attack on New Year’s Eve.
lead_paragraph: The numbers that usually glow with exchange rates on Travelex boards in airports worldwide have gone dark, after the London-based currency exchange company was forced to go offline after it discovered a ransomware attack on Dec. 31.
